5 SimulationWorld::SimulationWorld()
6  : min_bound_(-5.0, -5.0, -1.0), max_bound_(5.0, 5.0, 9.0), generator_(0) {}

8 void SimulationWorld::addObject(std::unique_ptr<Object> object) {
9  objects_.emplace_back(std::move(object));
10 }

12 void SimulationWorld::addGroundLevel(FloatingPoint height) {
13  objects_.emplace_back(
14  new PlaneObject(Point(0.0, 0.0, height), Point(0.0, 0.0, 1.0)));
15 }

17 void SimulationWorld::addPlaneBoundaries(FloatingPoint x_min,
18  FloatingPoint x_max,
19  FloatingPoint y_min,
20  FloatingPoint y_max) {
21  // X planes:
22  objects_.emplace_back(
23  new PlaneObject(Point(x_min, 0.0, 0.0), Point(1.0, 0.0, 0.0)));
24  objects_.emplace_back(
25  new PlaneObject(Point(x_max, 0.0, 0.0), Point(-1.0, 0.0, 0.0)));
26 
27  // Y planes:
28  objects_.emplace_back(
29  new PlaneObject(Point(0.0, y_min, 0.0), Point(0.0, 1.0, 0.0)));
30  objects_.emplace_back(
31  new PlaneObject(Point(0.0, y_max, 0.0), Point(0.0, -1.0, 0.0)));
32 }
33 
34 void SimulationWorld::clear() { objects_.clear(); }
35 
36 FloatingPoint SimulationWorld::getDistanceToPoint(
37  const Point& coords, FloatingPoint max_dist) const {
38  FloatingPoint min_dist = max_dist;
39  for (const std::unique_ptr<Object>& object : objects_) {
40  FloatingPoint object_dist = object->getDistanceToPoint(coords);
41  if (object_dist < min_dist) {
42  min_dist = object_dist;
43  }
44  }
45 
46  return min_dist;
47 }

49 void SimulationWorld::getPointcloudFromTransform(
50  const Transformation& pose, const Eigen::Vector2i& camera_res,
51  FloatingPoint fov_h_rad, FloatingPoint max_dist, Pointcloud* ptcloud,
52  Colors* colors) const {
53  const Point nominal_view_direction(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
54  Point view_direction = pose.getRotation().rotate(nominal_view_direction);
55  Point view_origin = pose.getPosition();
56 
57  getPointcloudFromViewpoint(view_origin, view_direction, camera_res, fov_h_rad,
58  max_dist, ptcloud, colors);
59 }
60 
61 void SimulationWorld::getPointcloudFromViewpoint(
62  const Point& view_origin, const Point& view_direction,
63  const Eigen::Vector2i& camera_res, FloatingPoint fov_h_rad,
64  FloatingPoint max_dist, Pointcloud* ptcloud, Colors* colors) const {
65  // Focal length based on fov.
66  const FloatingPoint focal_length =
67  camera_res.x() / (2 * tan(fov_h_rad / 2.0));
68 
69  // Calculate transformation between nominal camera view direction and our
70  // view direction. Nominal view is positive x direction.
71  const Point nominal_view_direction(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
72  Eigen::Quaternion<FloatingPoint> rotation_quaternion =
73  Eigen::Quaternion<FloatingPoint>::FromTwoVectors(nominal_view_direction,
74  view_direction);
75  rotation_quaternion.normalize();
76  const Rotation ray_rotation(rotation_quaternion);
77 
78  // Now actually iterate over all pixels.
79  for (int u = -camera_res.x() / 2; u < camera_res.x() / 2; ++u) {
80  for (int v = -camera_res.y() / 2; v < camera_res.y() / 2; ++v) {
81  Point ray_camera_direction =
82  Point(1.0, u / focal_length, v / focal_length);
83  Point ray_direction =
84  ray_rotation.rotate((ray_camera_direction).normalized());
85 
86  // Cast this ray into every object.
87  bool ray_valid = false;
88  FloatingPoint ray_dist = max_dist;
89  Point ray_intersect = Point::Zero();
90  Color ray_color;
91  for (const std::unique_ptr<Object>& object : objects_) {
92  Point object_intersect;
93  FloatingPoint object_dist;
94  bool intersects =
95  object->getRayIntersection(view_origin, ray_direction, max_dist,
96  &object_intersect, &object_dist);
97  if (intersects) {
98  if (!ray_valid || object_dist < ray_dist) {
99  ray_valid = true;
100  ray_dist = object_dist;
101  ray_intersect = object_intersect;
102  ray_color = object->getColor();
103  }
104  }
105  }
106  if (ray_valid) {
107  if (ray_intersect.array().isNaN().any()) {
108  LOG(ERROR) << "Simulation ray intersect is NaN!";
109  continue;
110  }
111  ptcloud->push_back(ray_intersect);
112  colors->push_back(ray_color);
113  }
114  }
115  }
116 }
117 
118 void SimulationWorld::getNoisyPointcloudFromTransform(
119  const Transformation& pose, const Eigen::Vector2i& camera_res,
120  FloatingPoint fov_h_rad, FloatingPoint max_dist, FloatingPoint noise_sigma,
121  Pointcloud* ptcloud, Colors* colors) {
122  const Point nominal_view_direction(0.0, 0.0, 1.0);
123  Point view_direction = pose.getRotation().rotate(nominal_view_direction);
124  Point view_origin = pose.getPosition();
125 
126  getNoisyPointcloudFromViewpoint(view_origin, view_direction, camera_res,
127  fov_h_rad, max_dist, noise_sigma, ptcloud,
128  colors);
129 }
130 
131 void SimulationWorld::getNoisyPointcloudFromViewpoint(
132  const Point& view_origin, const Point& view_direction,
133  const Eigen::Vector2i& camera_res, FloatingPoint fov_h_rad,
134  FloatingPoint max_dist, FloatingPoint noise_sigma, Pointcloud* ptcloud,
135  Colors* colors) {
136  // Focal length based on fov.
137  const FloatingPoint focal_length =
138  camera_res.x() / (2 * tan(fov_h_rad / 2.0));
139 
140  // Calculate transformation between nominal camera view direction and our
141  // view direction. Nominal view is positive x direction.
142  const Point nominal_view_direction(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
143  const Rotation ray_rotation(Eigen::Quaternion<FloatingPoint>::FromTwoVectors(
144  nominal_view_direction, view_direction));
145 
146  // Now actually iterate over all pixels.
147  for (int u = -camera_res.x() / 2; u < camera_res.x() / 2; ++u) {
148  for (int v = -camera_res.y() / 2; v < camera_res.y() / 2; ++v) {
149  Point ray_camera_direction =
150  Point(1.0, u / focal_length, v / focal_length);
151  Point ray_direction =
152  ray_rotation.rotate((ray_camera_direction).normalized());
153 
154  // Cast this ray into every object.
155  bool ray_valid = false;
156  FloatingPoint ray_dist = max_dist;
157  Point ray_intersect = Point::Zero();
158  Color ray_color;
159  for (const std::unique_ptr<Object>& object : objects_) {
160  Point object_intersect;
161  FloatingPoint object_dist;
162  bool intersects =
163  object->getRayIntersection(view_origin, ray_direction, max_dist,
164  &object_intersect, &object_dist);
165  if (intersects) {
166  if (!ray_valid || object_dist < ray_dist) {
167  ray_valid = true;
168  ray_dist = object_dist;
169  ray_intersect = object_intersect;
170  ray_color = object->getColor();
171  }
172  }
173  }
174  if (ray_valid) {
175  if (ray_intersect.array().isNaN().any()) {
176  LOG(ERROR) << "Simulation ray intersect is NaN!";
177  continue;
178  }
179  // Apply noise now!
180  FloatingPoint noise = getNoise(noise_sigma);
181  ray_dist += noise;
182  if (ray_dist < 0.0) {
183  ray_dist = 0.0;
184  }
185  ray_intersect = view_origin + ray_dist * ray_direction;
186 
187  ptcloud->push_back(ray_intersect);
188  colors->push_back(ray_color);
189  }
190  }
191  }
192 }
193 
194 FloatingPoint SimulationWorld::getNoise(FloatingPoint noise_sigma) {
195  const FloatingPoint mean = 0.0;
196  std::normal_distribution<FloatingPoint> dist(mean, noise_sigma);
197 
198  return dist(generator_);
199 }
